<template>
  <Detail />
</template>

<script>
import Detail from "./detail/DetailContent.vue";
import { ref } from "vue";

export default {
  name: "detail-page",

  data() {
    return {};
  },
  components: {
    Detail,
  },
  created() {
    console.log(this.$route.params.animeId);
    var variables = {
      id: 15125,
    };

    // Define the config we'll need for our Api request
    var url = "https://graphql.anilist.co",
      options = {
        method: "POST",
        headers: {
          "Content-Type": "application/json",
          Accept: "application/json",
        },
        body: JSON.stringify({
          query: query,
          variables: variables,
        }),
      };
  const anime = ref();
    fetch(url, listQuery[i].options)
      .then((response) => response.json())
      .then((data) => {
        list[i].value = data.data.Page.media;
      });
  },
};
</script>

<style></style>
